Comment_Text: Icici has buy now pay later option. Sell your PF and buy 4 times the same quantity. /s

Mera ek Demat account ICICI walo ne jabardasti banwa diya , account me ek bhi share nhi hai fir bhi annual maintenance charges bharta hu Ek account mummy ka hai sirf IPO me apply krne ke liye Main trading account corona ke time banaya tha abhi 2023 me use Krna start Kiya hu. So yeah that's why 2/3 demat accounts have less than 10k in it
